website_summaries.verdict: If you're a fan of the other Arkham games, you're going to really enjoy Arkham Knight, even if there's a handful of stuff you've seen before. The Batmobile and a number of new ideas and mechanics freshen the overall experience and the game's powerful brand of storytelling provides a satisfying connection between the in-game action.
pros: Being Batman has never been more fun, powerful or easy
Arkham Knight is a great action game with an engaging story and an all-star cast of Batman allies and enemies
There's tons to do in Gotham City and a solid diversity of gameplay, even after you're through with the main campaign
cons: Some Batman purists may take offense to the game's militaristic tendencies
Driving the Batmobile has a few quirks

customer_reviews.author: Flann O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great story, but gets a bit stale.
customer_reviews.text: Played through. Fun and great story, but gets a bit stale. Riddlers riddles are the best part.

customer_reviews.title: Good game, lots of new features
customer_reviews.text: I do like that this game seems longer than the previous Arkham games, and that you can drive the batmobile, but dear god some parts are finicky. Otherwise, it's a good addition to the series.

customer_reviews.title: sound and control are really nice, as well as the open environment
customer_reviews.text: Short and simple: there might be some flaws here and there but graphics, sound and control are really nice, as well as the open environment. There is enough variation and side missions to keep gamer entertained for at least ~40 plus hours. Definitely recommended. Go have fun with it!

customer_reviews.title: Its fun, just buy it and get it over with :)
customer_reviews.text: I started to talk about the overall feel of this game. It was following the majority of reviews, that being combat: fun, main story: meh, etc, etc. However, I realized that I enjoyed the story much more than thought I would. So I'll say this, if you played the other two games, then take those gameplay themes and styles and then scale it up to "11".

product_meta.title: Batman: Arkham Knight - Playstation 4
product_meta.description: For PlayStation owners, Batman Arkham Knight offers the exclusive Scarecrow Nightmare Pack, in which Gotham falls victim to Scarecrow's fear toxin, transforming the famous city into a twisted, hellish nightmare. Tear through the city in the all-new Batmobile and face off against a towering vision of Scarecrow and his undead army as they spread terror on the streets.
feature_bullets: For PlayStation owners, Batman Arkham Knight offers the exclusive Scarecrow Nightmare Pack, in which Gotham falls victim to Scarecrow's fear toxin, transforming the famous city into a twisted, hellish nightmare; Tear through the city in the all new Batmobile and face off against a towering vision of Scarecrow and his undead army as they spread terror on the streets
The Batmobile: Gamers have demanded it, and Batman: Arkham Knight delivers; The all new Batmobile sits at the heart of the gameplay experience and augments Batman's abilities in every respect

Next Gen Gotham City: Harnessing the power of the next generation of games systems, the entirety of Gotham City has been created in immense scale and with intimate detail offering players a truly legendary next gen game world

The Epic Conclusion to a Legendary Trilogy: Rocksteady Studios returns to the helm of the multi award winning franchise; Scarecrow is back to wreak his revenge against Batman joined by a completely new and original character, the Arkham Knight
Be The Batman: Batman, the Batmobile, the entirety of Gotham City; Batman: Arkham Knight is the complete and ultimate Batman offering
